about_the_game:
Mysterious planets are located in the Maskros Nebula—a galaxy far away from Earth.

In Pieces I: A Maskros Nebula Game, you solve three jigsaw puzzles that will give you a glimpse of three distant planets.

- First, we take a look at the exteriors of the pizzeria "PizzaPastaMaro" in the cyber city Emoh, which is located on the planet CobeeDot. PPM was founded by Maro, a sentient android, and is frequented by many pizza fans in the city.

- Next up is Nou-Raex—a planet not too far from CobeeDot that is rich in plants. Teenager Norx loves the quietude of the morning and enjoys his walks in the swamp.

- The third planet we visit is called Eskolea (or "Downpourlea" to its inhabitants). This rather dystopian planet is characterized by rainy, stormy, cloudy days and nights. Somewhat eerie that it's a rainless night all of a sudden...

Each puzzle consists of 144 pieces and takes about 30-60 minutes to complete. Featuring comic-style drawings, illustrative descriptions and a beautiful, soothing soundtrack, Pieces I introduces you to the universe of the Maskros Nebula and some iconic characters you will meet in later (narrative) owly crow games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system, Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver. Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Debian (xfce), and CentOS 7 and higher
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system, Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver. Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.)

short_description: Pieces I is a jigsaw puzzle game set in the mysterious Maskros Nebula universe. It features 3 comic-style puzzles and a calming ambient soundtrack. Get a glimpse of the cyber city of CobeeDot, visit the overgrown Nou-Raex and float through the dystopian Eskolea!
